item.title: Comal Crackers
item.description: Comal Crackers Comal is type of griddle/ round flat pan to heat up / cook certain types of things over a stove instead of oven. Originally I was making coconut crepes and another gluten free vegan crepe batter that is from my upbringing, then it lead to me experimenting to see what I can do with the batter instead of using loads more oil ( i was able to use a stainless steel pot to prepare the crêpes instead of a nonstick pan using a method with oil to make a stainless steel pot nonstick,that led to the crepes frying instead of cooking the way its supposed to, but it was crispy and yummy like I like it but too oily for me.

item.title: Fermented Carrots and/or Beets
item.description: Fermented Carrots and/or Beets Recipe makes one jar of fermented vegetable of your choice SUPPLIES: One 24-32 fl oz Mason jars that have screw on lids, or reuse any clean & sanitized glass jars that used to contain pasta sauce, pickles, etc. Thin cotton towel or cheese cloth and a rubber band, if using a mason jar with screw on lids. 3 medium carrots or 5 small beets (organic whenever possible).

item.title: About
item.description: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust Hugo Sousa synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment. Bring to the table win-win survival strategies to ensure proactive domination. At the end of the day, going forward, a new normal that has evolved from generation X is on the runway heading towards a streamlined cloud solution.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Menca comes with a built-in contact form, that you can use with Formspree service to handle up to 50 submissions per month for free. You could also easily switch to another contact form service if you want.
